body:
Comment 2 by **letters.random13**: 
for archival purposes, i can confirm the problem exists [same failure] for the most
recent version of the linaro gcc 4.6 chain
[root@localhost ~]# gcc --version
gcc (Linaro GCC 4.6-2013.05) 4.6.4 20130412 (Mer 4.6.4-1)
[root@localhost ~]# ld --version
GNU ld (GNU Binutils) 2.23.1

i have not yet tried the linaro 4.7 chain
